alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 6:40AM CST until January 12 at 7:45AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Leake County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Rankin County in central Mississippi... Northwestern Scott County in central Mississippi... North central Hinds County in central Mississippi... Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 745 AM CST. * At 640 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pocahontas, or 10 miles north of Clinton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Annandale around 650 AM CST. Madison and Gluckstadt around 655 AM CST. Canton around 700 AM CST. Sharon around 710 AM CST. Farmhaven around 720 AM CST. Ludlow around 725 AM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
